text: When Dr. Ed Kuffner, CMO, Consumer, #JNJ, returned to the frontlines to treat #COVID19 patients, he didn’t realize the impact it would have on him. This #MentalHealthMonth, Dr. Kuffner shares what this experience taught him about resilience & finding hope.
